message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.HC. 

This paper is likely to belong to the Natural Language Processing (NLP) sub-category of Computer Science (cs.CL) as it deals with machine translation evaluation, which is a common task in NLP. It could also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories as these fields are closely related to NLP. Information Retrieval (cs.IR) is another possible sub-category as machine translation evaluation involves finding the most relevant translation for a given text. Finally, Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) is a less likely sub-category as the paper proposes a new human evaluation metric, which could be relevant to the design of user interfaces for machine translation systems.
